name: NMB Technologies Corporation
description: NMB Technologies Corporation is a global leader in the design and manufacture of high-quality precision mechanical and electromechanical components. Founded in 1950, NMB is a subsidiary of the MinebeaMitsumi Group, a Japanese multinational company that specializes in manufacturing high-precision components. NMB is known for its extensive range of products, which include miniature and sub-miniature ball bearings, fans and blowers, and other advanced components used in various applications such as computing, telecommunications, automotive, and industrial equipment. With over 70 years of experience in the industry, NMB focuses on innovation and quality, utilizing advanced manufacturing techniques and rigorous quality control processes to ensure the reliability and performance of its products. The company operates multiple manufacturing facilities around the world, enabling it to serve a diverse customer base and meet the demands of an ever-evolving market. NMB is committed to sustainability and strives to reduce its environmental impact through energy-efficient practices and responsible sourcing. The company’s mission is to provide superior products and services while fostering long-term relationships with its customers and partners.

faq.question: Where is NMB Technologies headquartered?

faq.question: Who is the CEO of NMB Technologies?
faq.answer: Kazuhito Yamamoto is the CEO of NMB Technologies Corporation.
